EmailTemplate.name: April Emails 2019.Training & Certification 4-2-19
EmailTemplate.subject: 4/24/19 Webinar - How Pivotal Training and Certification Can Make a Difference for You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar How Pivotal Training and Certification Can Make a Difference for You <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-24-how-pivotal-training-and-certification-can-make-a-difference-for-you-webinar?utm_campaign=train-cert-make-a-diff-q219&utm_source=sales-email&utm_medium=email]]> on April 24, 2019.
Pivotal Education enables you to continuously deliver business value in a rapidly evolving market by providing the modern software expertise you need to excel in a cloud-native world.
In this webinar, we will discuss the breadth of training, certification and the Platform Acceleration Lab (PAL) options available for Spring and Cloud Foundry developers, architects, and operators.
We'll also show you how Pivotal Education makes it easy create a custom Spring or Cloud Foundry training plan specific to your learning needs and schedule, using in-person and online content and tools.
Presenters: Tyson Gern, Director, Pivotal Education Dylan Ham, Lead, Pivotal Education
Date: Wednesday, April 24, 2019 Time: 10:00am PDT / 1:00pm EDT
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-24-how-pivotal-training-and-certification-can-make-a-difference-for-you-webinar?utm_campaign=train-cert-make-a-diff-q219&utm_source=sales-email&utm_medium=email]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
